meanings.sent1: The desert has a seasonless climate, with hot temperatures all year round.
meanings.sent2: Living in a tropical region means experiencing a seasonless environment.
meanings.sent3: The penguin felt out of place in the seasonless heat of the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe consisted of seasonless clothing that could be worn at any time of the year.
meanings.sent5: The seasonless landscape of the Arctic Circle was both beautiful and desolate.

meanings.definition: Not subject to change with the seasons.
meanings.sent1: The company's profits remained seasonless, unaffected by economic fluctuations.
meanings.sent2: His love for her was seasonless, unwavering regardless of the time of year.
meanings.sent3: The robot's efficiency was seasonless, always performing at its peak.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a seasonless tree, standing strong through all weather.
meanings.sent5: The bond between them was seasonless, enduring through all trials.
